# StaticBigInt.IntegerLiteralType

**Type Alias**

A type that represents an integer literal.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias IntegerLiteralType = StaticBigInt
```

## Discussion

The standard library integer and floating-point types are all valid types for `IntegerLiteralType`.
title: StaticBigInt.IntegerLiteralType
